verses.text_plain: I said, I will take heed to my ways, that I sin not with my tongue: I will keep my mouth with a bridle, while the wicked is before me.

▼ my mouth…: Heb. a bridle, or, muzzle for my mouth

tokens.definition: תּוֹשָׁב tôwshâb, to-shawb'; or תֹּשָׁב tôshâb; (1 Kings 17:1), from H3427 ; a dweller but not outlandish [ H5237 ]; especially (as distinguished from a native citizen [active participle of H3427 ] and a temporary inmate [ H1616 ] or mere lodger [ H3885 ]) resident alien:—foreigner, inhabitant, sojourner, stranger.
